column4: I've got a thinkpad x22 laptop, 800 mhz(PIII), with 128 megs of ram, and 3 gig hdd. What is a good distribution of GNU/Linux to use on it? It's for a teacher.
The teacher probably needs a web browser, email client, and office suite
Is it possible/easy to modify gnome to run half decent on this machine with ubuntu?
